title: Happy New Year
description: This book continues the first two books' storyline for Sarantos and his crew in space, the final frontier. Sarantos moves through this book with a unique emotional slant while trapped in an unknown, dark corner of space. The key to survival is delicate and the whole crew is on edge.  A fantastic journey awaits Sarantos and his crew with some interesting plot twists. This book offers epic battles scenes and its surprise twist ending will shock you to your core.  The riveting characters in this book continue to come to life and their character development will have you hopelessly hanging on as the reader tries to to keep up with the many moving parts. Will the mission succeed?  As a world of secrets is revealed page after page, Sarantos and his crew make one last stand! Follow along on this brand new space journey exploring the intricacies of a starship, peppered with many raw emotional trimmings, as they begin to discover and solve the mysteries that await!  Read Happy New Year with your eyes and heart wide open. You'll feel the intrigue find you as you leave behind this world and glide towards the future of outer spaceâ€¦
author: Sarantos
